MESSAGE.value: Refractored whole project. This design looks better to me. Tested everything up until now.
Added TextureRenderer for reflection/refraction textures and also tested it. Refractored whole project.
Changed index loader so now it extends vertices loader as should be.
Added base texture renderer class. Also refractored textures so now they take internalFormat, format and type as parameters.
Refractored everything once more. Added delayed set uniform methods. Added clipDistanceRenderer.
Added a refraction texture renderer with texture depth attachment.
Added a water tile with reflection and refraction effects.
Added a dudv map for distortion. Also added move factor so now it looks like the water moves.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Added a dudv map for distortion. Also added move factor so now it looks like the water moves.
